title: Editing Sessions: Expert Photography Tips & Tricks by Mike Will
description: Get the most out of your smartphone camera with this range of simple tutorials from a selection of the UK's top technology influencers

components.copy: Expert Photography Tips & Tricks by Mike Will

text: Welcome to the Editing Sessions, a chance to learn tips from the professionals on how to get the most out of your smartphone camera.

Leading content creator Mike Will shares his expert photography tips and tricks using the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE. This easy to follow tutorial covers how to use Live Focus mode to its full potential during the holiday season.
